title: Reincarnation - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Martial Arts   Shounen   Wuxia
tags: Adapted to Manhwa   Male Protagonist   Royalty   Transmigration
author: 신갈나무
description:
My dream was to become an armed escort and deliver goods on a fancy horse. 

However, being a limp, I never could triumph any combat techniques. 

I forever lived as a porter doing all the dirty work before I swore and resisted to bandits and got murdered…>
